category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_shared_server_metadata_cache_mgr_sleep_minutes
preference.preference_description: Defines the sleep time in minutes for the Teamcenter Shared Metadata Cache Service to check for updates to metadata cache. The default value is 10 minutes. Valid Values: Any value from 1 to 1440. If the value is outside this range, the default value will be used.
